original: Ljunggren, Gustaf Karl, biskop. Skara, f. 9/1/89 i Uddevalla av kontr:-prosten Carl L. o. Hedvig von Kru-senstierna. G. 18 m. Annie Ekströ-mer. Barn: Kerstin f. 23, Margareta 28. — Teol. fil. ex. i Upps. 08, teol. kand. 12, prakt. teol. ex. 13, teol. lic. 17, prästv. 18, teol. dr 21. Docent i dogmatik 20. V. pastor i Danmarks förs. 18-22, tf. kontr :prost i Vaksala kontr. 20-22, past :adj. i Upps. 23-25, tf. prof. i syst. teol. v. Upps. univ. 22-23 o. 28-29, lär. i symbolik där 24-28 o. 29, förest, f. FjelLstedtska sk. 29, kyrkoh. i Gustavi förs. o. domprost i Gbg 30, biskop i Skara stift sed. 35. Led. av Sv. kyrkans diakonistyr. sed. 37, ordf. i Sv. diakonsällsk. sed. 38, i Allim. sv. prästfören. 39-47, led. av 44 års dissenterlagkomm. Skr.: Zur Geschichte der christl. Heilsgewissheit (20), Det kristna syndmedvetandet intill Luther (24), Synd o. skuld i Luthers teol. (28), Luthers ’Stora katekes (övers, jämte inledn. o. anm. 31), Luthers nattvardslära (31), Herdabrev (35). KNOlkl, hed:dr v. Augustanasynodens teol. sem. i Rock Island, m., USA, 38.
translated: Ljunggren, Gustaf Karl, Bishop. Skara, born on 9/1/89 in Uddevalla, son of the parish priest Carl L. and Hedvig von Krusenstierna. Married in 18 to Annie Ekströmer. Children: Kerstin born in 23, Margareta in 28. Completed theological studies at Uppsala University, receiving a Bachelor of Theology degree in 1908, completed theological cand. exam in 1912, practical theological exam in 1913, licentiate in theology in 1917, ordained as a priest in 1918, obtained a Doctor of Theology degree in 1921. Became an associate professor in dogmatics in 1920. Assistant pastor in Denmark's parish from 1918-1922, acting parish priest in Vaksala parish from 1920-1922, assistant pastor in Uppsala from 1923-1925, acting professor in systematic theology at Uppsala University from 1922-1923 and 1928-1929, teacher in symbolics there from 1924-1928 and 1929, appointed headmaster of the Fjellstedtska school in 1929. Served as a parish priest in Gustavi parish and cathedral provost in Gothenburg from 1930, and as bishop of the Skara diocese since 1935. Member of the Diakonistyrkan (Deacon's Board) of the Swedish Church since 1937, chairman of the Swedish Deacon Society since 1938, chairman of the General Swedish Priest Association from 1939-1947, and member of the 44 years' dissenting law committee. Publications: Zur Geschichte der christl. Heilsgewissheit (20), Det kristna syndmedvetandet intill Luther (24), Synd o. skuld i Luthers teol. (28), Luthers 'Stora katekes' (translated with an introduction and notes in 31), Luthers nattvardslära (31), Herdabrev (35). Honorary doctorate from Augustana Theological Seminary in Rock Island, Minnesota, USA, in 1938.
